name: sendMqttMessage
func:
let userCreds = global.get('userCreds');
let globalTopic = userCreds.location + "/" + userCreds.device_id + "/"

let msgWrapper = {}
msgWrapper.operator = "SetCtpDoor"
msgWrapper.session_id = "0"
msgWrapper.message_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1692797271182).toString();;
msgWrapper.info = Object.assign(global.get('device_set_idxs'), global.get('door_settings'))

msg.payload = msgWrapper
msg.topic = globalTopic + "Operate" + "/"

global.set('messageId', msgWrapper.message_id)


return msg

name: setDevicesIdx
handleSetRd-Ack
setReader2
setTimezone
func:
let userCreds = global.get('userCreds');
let cpoint_instance = global.get('cpoint_instance')
let globalTopic = userCreds.location + "/" + userCreds.device_id + "/"

let msgWrapper = {}
msgWrapper.operator = "SetDateTime"
msgWrapper.session_id = "0"
msgWrapper.message_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1692797271182).toString();
msgWrapper.info = cpoint_instance.time_settings

msgWrapper.info.DateTime = Date.now()
msgWrapper.info.GMT = 7200
msgWrapper.info.NTP1 = "pool.ntp.org"
msgWrapper.info.NTP2 = "pool2.ntp.org:123"
msgWrapper.info.DST_Shift = 3600


msg.payload = msgWrapper
msg.topic = globalTopic + "Operate" + "/"

global.set('messageId', msgWrapper.message_id)

return msg

name: persistMqttSettings
func:
let mqttSettings = global.get('mqtt_settings')
let json = {}
json.host = mqttSettings.host
json.port = mqttSettings.port
json.username = mqttSettings.username
json.password = mqttSettings.password

msg.payload = json
return msg

name: function 1
func:
let obj = JSON.parse(msg.payload)

global.set('door_settings', obj.door_settings)
global.set('device_set_idxs', obj.device_set_idxs)
global.set('time_settings', obj.time_settings)
global.set('rd_0_set', obj.reader_1_settings)
global.set('rd_1_set', obj.reader_2_settings)

format: utf8

name: function 2
func:
global.set('door_settings', {
    Door_sens_opt: 0,
    Door_sens_idx: 0,
    Door_sens_Condition: 0,
    Button_rex_opt: 0,
    Button_rex_idx: 1,
    Button_rex_Condition: 1,
    Lock_Relay_opt: 0,
    Lock_Relay_idx: 0,
    Door_Lock_mode: 0,
    Door_Lock_type: 0,
    Door_Lock_puls: 200,
    Door_Delay: 5,
    Door_Sens_Autolock: false
})
global.set('device_set_idxs', {
    Control_point_idx: 1001,
    Rd1_idx: 2002,
    Rd0_idx: 2001
})
global.set('time_settings', {
    DST_GMT: true,
    tz: "GMT0"
})
global.set('rd_0_set', {
    Rd_opt: 1,
    Rd_Direction: 0,
    Rd_Key_endian: false,
    Rd_beep: true,
    Rd_Wg_type: 3
})
global.set('rd_1_set', {
    Rd_opt: 1,
    Rd_Direction: 1,
    Rd_Key_endian: true,
    Rd_beep: true,
    Rd_Wg_type: 3
})

name: persistDeviceLocation
function 30
function 31
setSchedule
function 33
func:
let device_set_idxs = global.get('device_set_idxs')
let userCreds = global.get('userCreds');

let schedule_instance = RED.util.cloneMessage(global.get('schedule'))
schedule_instance.Shedule_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 4294967295)
schedule_instance.Ctp_idx = device_set_idxs.Control_point_idx
schedule_instance.TmStart /= 1000
schedule_instance.TmEnd /= 1000

schedule_instance.TmStart = schedule_instance.TmStart.toString()
schedule_instance.TmEnd = schedule_instance.TmEnd.toString()

let globalTopic = userCreds.location + "/" + userCreds.device_id + "/"

let msgWrapper = {}
msgWrapper.operator = "SetSdlDaily"
msgWrapper.session_id = "0"
msgWrapper.message_id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1692797271182).toString()

msgWrapper.info = RED.util.cloneMessage(schedule_instance)
msg.payload = msgWrapper
msg.topic = globalTopic + "Operate" + "/"
global.set('messageId', msgWrapper.message_id)

global.set("schedule_instance", schedule_instance)


return msg
